title: O The Lord Has Passed By

verses.text:
O THE Lord has passed by, and he's given me a blessing,
And that's what the Lord has done for me.
Glory, glory, glory,
And that's what the Lord has done for me.

Is there anybody here like weeping Mary?
O call on my Jesus and he'll draw near.
Glory, glory, &c.

Is there anybody here like sinking Peter?
O call on my Jesus and he'll draw near.
Glory, glory, &c.

Is there anybody here like doubting, Thomas?
O call on my Jesus and he'll draw near.
Glory, glory, &c.

Is there anybody here that wants salvation?
O call on my Jesus and he'll draw near.
Glory, glory, &c.
